name: Romancing of Heroes: Boys' Side
description:
Zenith: a once peaceful continent now ravaged by war. The kingdom of Askr seeks to bring peace once more, but their forces are limited. They're going to need help. But who will rise...?

You are the Summoner, an average young man brought to the world of Zenith to lead the royal army of Askr against the Emblan Empire and the kingdom of Muspell. Although saving the world and defending Askr is your top priority, who says romance will get in the way of things? It's a good thing you have a whole army of eligible bachelors at your disposal!

You have one year to get the man of your dreams. Will you get his heart, or will he break yours?

Features:

  • Two romance routes available at the start (with unlockable routes available in a future update)
  • Raise your stats, buy items, and summon cute guys (in a future update)!

Notes:

  • This game contains one optional scene where the two main guys are naked. This scene is censored, and involves no references to sex.

This game was originally created for Yaoi Game Jam 2018. Check out the game's game jam entry page here.
